Java.Sql
class SQLRecoverableException








class SQLRecoverableException

The subclass of Java.Sql.SQLException thrown in situations where a
previously failed operation might be able to succeed if the application performs
 some recovery steps and retries the entire transaction or in the case of a
distributed transaction, the transaction branch.  
At a minimum,
the recovery operation must include closing the current connection and getting
a new connection.









Since: 
1.6
